familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $15,001 - $50,000 in Interest income from GALLANT FUNDING, LP (Lending to real estate developers for real estate projects in New York and New Jersey) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: Gallant Funding, LP (Lending To Real Estate Developers for Real Estate Projects In New York And New Jersey)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received $15,001 - $50,000 in Interest income from GALLANT FUNDING, LP (Lending to real estate developers for real estate projects in New York and New Jersey) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. This asset has been divested.
familyMemberEthics.business: Gallant Funding, LP (Lending To Real Estate Developers for Real Estate Projects In New York And New Jersey)
